resources.string:
I am a fresh graduate (2021) with good knowledge in Flutter and Android. 
I have enough knowledge in Dart, Java, Kotlin, OOP, Data Structure, Android Studio, Provider, Bloc, MVVM, Rest APIs and Firebase (Firestore/Authentication). 
Also, I have effective communication skills that allow me to be open to discussion. 
I am looking forward to gain experience without getting bored with the number of attempts to understand and solve any new problem or challenge.
